column4: Anyone know if there's any configuration changes needed to connect to a remote server (not linux) from an ubuntu workstation using XDMCP ?
I'm just getting a black screen when I connect
Or, barring that, just an explaination of the protocol/connection proceedure would be good
you have to enable xdmcp in the server. Xdmcp isn't the best choice for remote access...you might want to look at X-forwarding over ssh
